mapper.select: SELECT dbo.Account_Data.Account_ID AS Acount_ID, dbo.Account_Data.Account_Name AS account_name, dbo.Account_Data.Account_Pwd AS account_pwd, dbo.Account_Data.Account_State AS account_state FROM dbo.Account_Data WHERE Account_Name=#{Account_Name} AND Account_Pwd=#{Account_Pwd} AND Account_State='在用'

SELECT dbo.Account_Data.Account_Name AS account_name, dbo.Rule_Data.Rule_Name AS Rule_Name, dbo.Position_Data.Position_Name AS Position_Name FROM dbo.Rule_Data INNER JOIN dbo.Position_Rule_Data ON dbo.Rule_Data.Rule_ID = dbo.Position_Rule_Data.Rule_ID INNER JOIN dbo.Position_Data ON dbo.Position_Rule_Data.Position_ID=dbo.Position_Data.Position_ID INNER JOIN dbo.Account_Data ON dbo.Position_Data.Position_ID=dbo.Account_Data.Position_ID WHERE dbo.Rule_Data.Rule_Name LIKE '%员工%' OR dbo.Rule_Data.Rule_Name LIKE '%人员%' OR dbo.Rule_Data.Rule_Name like '%考勤%' AND dbo.Account_Data.Account_Name=#{Account_Name}
SElECT COUNT(a.Account_Name) FROM dbo.Account_Data a WHERE a.Account_Name=#{Account_Name}
